headline: Dragon Shield Announces New Licensing Agreement with Hasbro and Wizards of the Coast to Produce Official MAGIC: THE GATHERING Gaming Accessories
summary: Dragon Shield, a global leader in premium trading card game accessories, is excited to announce a new collaboration with Hasbro and its Wizards of the Coast division to produce licensed trading card game (TCG) accessories for MAGIC: THE GATHERING, focusing on classic/evergreen, iconic imagery from the world's most popular trading card game.

content.title: Dragon Shield Announces New Licensing Agreement with Hasbro and Wizards of the Coast to Produce Official MAGIC: THE GATHERING Gaming Accessories
